reviewText: I bought this set just for Swearing Allegiance but when I watched the others I was pleasantly surprised. I like them all.
I have to say Im very happy with this dvd because all the movies are great and all are true stories and my shipping came in two days this is a must see I give this dvd a 5 star

Very happy with this purchase! These are pretty hard to find tv movies and the price for all three is amazing! The shipping was very fast it actually arrived a day early from the expected arrival date. Also the dvd packaging is awesome it actually has a little fold out box which has a mini bio of one actor from each film! Would order from this seller without question.
I have looked all over to buy swearing allegiance. It was out of print, I not only found it on amazon, but in a three pack. I love these movies.
